artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting refactoring of Bimodal Metalogic modules for publication-ready structure

completion_data.completion_summary: Refactored Bimodal Metalogic modules for publication-ready structure. Archived duplicate DeductionTheorem to Boneyard, renamed semantic_weak_completeness to fmp_weak_completeness with backwards-compatible alias, rewrote Metalogic.lean with comprehensive documentation highlighting all SORRY-FREE main theorems (soundness, completeness, decidability). Updated READMEs with current sorry counts (4 total, all in helper lemmas).
